Posts.Content: Was set to have 6 treatments tch and did mri after 4 that on showed a 5 mm spot which oc thinks it could be some dead cells around the clip. My tumor her pos showed in the node and pet was good Doc says we can skip last 2 and do double in about 30 days and if path shows any cancer we can do the last 2. Tumor was gone to the touch after 1st round. Cant make up my mind of what the heck to do. Should I look for another oc take on this ? Going to have 13 more Herceptin either way.Â  i
Posts.Title: Stopping Chemo Early
